problem_text_cn: 如图,用一个半径为5cm的定滑轮带动重物上升,滑轮上一点P旋转了108°,假设绳索(粗细不计)与滑轮之间没有滑动,则重物上升了()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, a fixed pulley with a radius of N_0 is used to drive the weight up. The point P on the pulley rotates by N_1. Assuming there is no sliding between the rope (not counting the thickness) and the pulley, the weight rises ()
raw_answer: 试题分析:根据定滑轮的性质得到重物上升的即为转过的弧长,利用弧长公式得:l=\frac{108π×5}{180}=3πcm,故选C.
